hi and welcome you listening to the x-22
report my name is Dave and SEPA sewed
1536 a and today's date is April 4th
2018 and the title of the episode is
this is not about a trade war it's about
crashing and resetting the economic
system let's get into the economic
collapse financial news now there's been
a battle going on on who's gonna control
the narrative as the economy comes down
and today we can see that Trump was out
there and he just basically launched a
missile at the Central Bank at the
corporate media to let them know no this
is not a trade war the United States
lost this war a long time ago and what
he was actually saying was that this has
been going on for a very long time I am
NOT going to be responsible for the
economy falling apart
because the central bank the deep state
and those individuals controlling the
united states since 1913 they're the
ones who destroyed the economy and you
can tell that he is pushing this
narrative right now we're going to get
into that a little bit later in this
report but let's start off with what is
happening in the economy and this
economic system is deteriorating very
very quickly it's accelerating right now
the housing market is coming down the US
service sector is slumping we can see
that everything is starting to fall
apart very very rapidly now if we look
out in Toronto we see prices of detached
houses they have plunged by two hundred
and seven thousand from a year ago and
sales they are collapsing right now and
if we go back like 18 years ago we can
see that the Toronto housing market
continually moved up and up and up
actually barely dipped during the
financial crisis and what are we seeing
today well we're starting to see the
whole thing start to fall apart home
sales in the Greater Toronto Area
plunged by thirty nine point five
percent in March compared to a year ago
and we see that detached
as they plunge by negative 46.3%
semi-detached houses plunge by negative
30.6% townhouses negative 34.2% condos
negative 32.7%
and new listings of homes for sale down
twelve point four percent from a year
ago and this is spreading we talked
about the New York economy the New York
real estate economy and it's all falling
apart real estate sales and Manhattan
plunged by twenty five percent in the
first quarter from a year ago sales in
the first quarter post of the largest
drop in nearly a decade and reached
their lowest level in more than six
years there were two thousand 180 sales
in the first quarter compared with two
thousand eight hundred ninety two last
year the high end of the market is
getting hit the hardest because nobody
is lowering their prices they're keeping
them pretty much where they are and the
reason they're doing this is because
they don't feel they need to lower the
prices just yet we saw this happen
during the 2008 crisis prior to this
where the housing market started to fall
apart
and people didn't understand what was
going on so they didn't lower the
housing prices because they were being
told that everything is fine real estate
doesn't go down and everyone kept the
real estate prices to where they were
and then they come to find out later on
that they needed to lower their rates
because the real estate market was
falling apart and basically everyone was
trying to catch the market at this point
where the prices were coming down so
quickly they would lower their price by
ten thousand but the market came down by
twenty thousand and they never could
catch the market this is why a lot of
people had a very difficult time trying
to sell their homes now there is a map
which is the real estate doomsday map
and it covers the entire United States
and there's different portions of it
where there's distressed at risk
mid-tier comfortable and prosperous now
looking at this map we can see most of
the Northeast the mid centralized East
the south east well it looks like
they're either at risk
or distressed moving out to the Midwest
same thing at-risk distressed I would
say eighty-five to ninety percent of the
country right now is at risk or
distressed and mid-tier which means that
since 2008 nothing has been solved the
people who own their homes they're still
underwater they're still having problems
nothing has been fixed as of yet now
what we're seeing here is a system that
is breaking down right in front of our
eyes everything they did in 2008 was a
gigantic illusion by manipulating pretty
much everything they manipulated the
housing market by creating bubbles in 20
different cities they manipulated the
unemployment rate they manipulated the
stock market which they're still doing
they manipulated the precious metals
market they manipulated the GDP numbers
they manipulated every statistical
number you can think of they manipulated
it and what was happening was as we can
see with our own eyes is that the entire
economic system has been breaking down
one piece at a time now going back many
years we said the the retail industry
would rip itself apart and it slowly
happened now of course they changed the
story first they said oh wreath Hills
not doing well because of the snow the
bad weather they started out with that
but then what happened was retail was
doing poorly during the nice weather and
they didn't know what else to say so
then they started to say hey you know
what we can use the story that online is
really having an effect on you know
what's going on in the retail market now
they couldn't explain away things like
food and things like that so they just
pretended that didn't exist and they
just said yeah everything's moving to
online of course they look at the actual
numbers to see how many sales there were
online compared in the per compared to
the brick-and-mortar stores and you can
see this is a very very big difference
everything is not moving as a 1:1 ratio
and of course then they blamed it on
Amazon they built Amazon up very very
big to make it seem like everyone is
shopping at Amazon that nobody else has
an online presence everyone is just
going to am
which is not true and what we're seeing
right now is the retail market has
imploded and what's going on here is
that every other piece of the economic
structure is imploding right now and as

worse now this brings us to what Trump

the central bankers know it Trump knows
it the individuals and the

what is happening right now everything
is falling apart and he's trying to tell

you're gonna start to hear a lot of this

what he's really doing is preparing us

because most of the government officials

try to control the narrative and blame

this plan is to hit the central bank the

this is his strategy and by taking down

markets by destroying the manipulation
by destroying all this basically what

because the truth is hard the truth is
real living in an illusion
well that's easy because you just

continually to enslave you it's a dream

not going to understand what is

this is why we need to come off the gold

and we're going to see gas lines we're

they controlled it they made people

now the central bank is getting prepared
but their narrative the Trump
